channel.title: Comments on: Web2.0 jobs in Ireland – exciting new startup Ammado is hiring….

item.title: By: Sam Allen
item.dc:creator: Sam Allen
item.description:
Hey,
Just wondering where else is good to find some good push the boundaries companies in Ireland who are looking to hire?
Creative Director / Product Manager from NZ with 7 years experience who just arrived in Dublin.
My CV for reference .. http://defunc.com/new/profile/Sam_Allen_Resume.pdf
Cheers
item.content:encoded:
Hey,

Just wondering where else is good to find some good push the boundaries companies in Ireland who are looking to hire?

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: I wonder if we should include a jobs page with some information about the working environment and culture in Ireland.
